game.components
Class BackgroundLabel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  game.components.BackgroundLabel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
Stopwatch
public class BackgroundLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel

BackgroundLabel allows for a image to be displayed as the background for a label.

Author:
Chris Barton
See Also:
Serialized Form
